text: Rafe Joseph Spall (born 10 March 1983)Yahoo! Movies profile is an English actor. He is best known for his roles in The Shadow Line, Pete versus Life, One Day, Anonymous, Prometheus, Life of Pi, The Big Short, The BFG, and Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom. His father is actor Timothy Spall. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Interview about the BBC's The Rotters' Club Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:English voice actors Category:English radio actors Category:Actors from London Category:People from Camberwell
title: Rafe Spall
